attributes.action: Throw out motorway lane pricing, the thin end of the wedge to full road pricing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already have a perfectly good pay-as-you-drive tax - it is called petrol tax.  Lane pricing is the thin end of the wedge to full road pricing.  The government can reduce the number of free lanes slowly until we have full road pricing.  And of course, your every move is tracked, Orwell style.
